name: Grilled American Fillet
description: Pork fillet, ginger, garlic, honey, pepper & canola oil. Creamy chesapeake crab dip with artichoke, baked and topped with cheddar cheese, with crusty bread for dipping.

name: Grilled Seafood Paella
description: Monkfish, onion, paella rice, garlic & smoked paprika. Creamy chesapeake crab dip with artichoke, baked and topped with cheddar cheese, with crusty bread for dipping.

name: Roast Sea Trout
description: Roast trout, English asparagus, watercress & royals. Creamy chesapeake crab dip with artichoke, baked and topped with cheddar cheese, with crusty bread for dipping.

name: Smoked Paprika Hum
description: Red peppers, roasted garlic, lemon slices, olives & mint. Creamy crab dip with artichoke, baked and topped with cheddar cheese, with crusty bread for dipping.
